name: Umeboshi (five hundred years old)
description: It is a traditional Japanese food that has been popular since ancient times. This is ...... five hundred years!?

name: Umeboshi (five hundred years of aging)
description: It is umeboshi that has been matured for five hundred years.

name: Umeboshi (ripening for five hundred years)
description: Time is flowing rapidly by using a time expansion system. If it is this, maturation will be finished in about two years.

use_action.msg: Aging for five hundred years is over. It will surely be delicious.
use_action.not_ready_msg: It has not matured enough yet.

name: Umeboshi (aging for five hundred years)
description: It is a gift for a new human being who lives in the end of the century. What kind of world will it be after five hundred years? I would like you to eat this pickled plum under the wonderful civilization.

use_action.msg: Aging for five hundred years is over. It will surely be delicious.
use_action.not_ready_msg: It has not matured enough yet.

name: Umeboshi (100 years old)
description: It is a traditional Japanese food that has been popular since ancient times. Pectin of plum dissolved in plum vinegar and became jelly-like, and it is the best taste not different from the history of one hundred years.

name: Umeboshi (100 years of ripening completed)
description: It is umeboshi that has been matured for 100 years. Please take it out of the bottle by disassembling.

name: Umeboshi (one hundred years of rapid ripening)
name_plural: Umeboshi (one hundred years of rapid ripening)
description: Time is flowing rapidly by using a time expansion system. If it is this, maturation will be finished in about half a year.

use_action.msg: One hundred years of aging are over. It will surely be delicious.
use_action.not_ready_msg: It has not matured enough yet.

name: Umeboshi (100 years of ripening)
description: It is ripened ume for aging to bring out more delicious taste. I look forward to living with umeboshi for over a hundred years. Let's live in the end of the century.

use_action.msg: One hundred years of aging are over. It will surely be delicious.
use_action.not_ready_msg: It has not matured enough yet.

name: Umeboshi (30 years old)
description: It is a traditional Japanese food that has been popular since ancient times. Very healthy and delicious. It is very delicious because it has been aged for thirty years.

name: Umeboshi (30 years of ripening completion)
description: It is umeboshi that has been matured for thirty years. (Please take it out of the bag by disassembly)

name: Umeboshi (high speed ripening for thirty years)
name_plural: Umeboshi (high speed ripening for thirty years)
description: Time is flowing rapidly by using a time expansion system. If it is this, it will finish ripening if there is one month.

use_action.msg: Aging for thirty years is over. It will surely be delicious.
use_action.not_ready_msg: It has not matured enough yet.

name: Umeboshi (during thirty years of ripening)
description: It is ripened ume for aging to bring out more delicious taste. It's strange that looking at it this way, you will be looking forward to living longer even at the end of this century.

use_action.msg: Aging for thirty years is over. It will surely be delicious.

name: Umeboshi (one year old)
description: It is a traditional Japanese food that has been popular since ancient times. Very healthy and delicious. It has become more delicious because it has been aged for one year.

name: Umeboshi (one year ripening completion)
description: It is umeboshi that aging of one year is over. Please take it out of the bag by disassembly.

name: umeboshi
description: It is a traditional Japanese food that has been popular since ancient times. Very healthy and delicious. It will never decay if stored properly.

name: umezu
description: It is sour and salty plum vinegar. The nutrients of plum are mixed in and it is very good for health. It can also be used as a seasoning like soy sauce (convert it to soy sauce from the crafting menu).

name: Umeboshi (dried)
description: It is umeboshi that has been dried enough. Finally, by removing it from the colander, drying for the earth ends. I am excited at the expectation that it will be delicious! Please remove the plum radish from the colander for decomposition.

name: umeboshi in soil
description: Sun drying of plum radish is called soil drying. As well as increasing umami taste, sterilization by sunshine sterilization and storability are enhanced by skipping moisture. (Please use it when it becomes 80 (Please keep carrying this item on a sunny day))

use_action.need_charges_msg: It has not dried enough yet.

name: salted umeboshi
description: It is salted umeboshi that is well-matched with plum vinegar. Some seems to come out with sour and refreshing smell.

name: salted umeboshi
description: Apricot can be used in the same way as plum. It is pickled plum with 20% salt. Plum vinegar comes out after putting weight on for a while. It needs to be aged for about a month.

use_action.msg: It's ready now. Let's dry it and make it umeboshi.
